name: data-analysis-report
description: Generate comprehensive data analysis reports from Excel files using LLM-powered insights
author: data-analysis-webui
abstract: Automatically analyze Excel data and generate comprehensive Word reports with charts, statistics, and AI-powered insights. Supports offline deployment with Ollama/vLLM models. Features automatic Excel structure detection, natural language time window parsing, metric disambiguation, statistical analysis (trends, percentiles, outliers, correlations), and professional Word document generation with time-series charts and AI-written insights.
capabilities: Excel file parsing with automatic date and metric column detection
Natural language request processing using LLM
Metric disambiguation for similar column names
Time window resolution (relative and absolute dates)
Statistical analysis (mean, min, max, median, std, percentiles, outliers, drift)
Time-series chart generation with trend lines
requirements: Ollama or vLLM service (for LLM capabilities)
FastAPI server running on configured port
Excel file with date column and numeric metrics
